title: Imagine allowing ad champions to continuously stomp over and not give a fuck
body:
Rylais is too strong? BETTER GUT IT
Meanwhile duskblade has been fucking stupid on basically every ad assassin ever.
Like ill literally not give a fuck about all the ad assassin items if you bring back dfg. Easily. Point and click nuke to even out the playing field because fuck that bias riot.

replies.body:
And then you hear things like "Assassins don't have enough damage without {{item:3147}}"
Fuck I shouldn't die to a {{champion:238}} who pressed R, missed every skillshot, hit one AA, proc electrocute and kills me from this

And then you have champions who'll just 100-0 you without even using an AA {{champion:91}}, or just use it to secure the kill (post-6 obviously)

> And then you have champions who'll just 100-0 you without even using an AA {{champion:91}}, or just use it to secure the kill (post-6 obviously)

+ the slow on duskblade lets zed land his shurikens even if behind he does enough damage to kill a squishy with just 1 item. i was playing ez and a zed who had a duskblade + cleaver came top lane used his Shadow to gap close on me R me when he came out he got 1 AA off before i E to proc duskblade then i flashed the shurikens and his R poped + electrocute and i was taking to less than 5% hp from full. this is without him using ignite or landing anything other than a R AA R pop Electrocute.

Sound fair to me.

I'm so tired of this bs "AD assassin mid always if you don't you're a troll" nonsense.
